message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think 60-40 is a good deal, but the other way around!
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a compromise!
You're losing value, I'm not. Time to adjust the split!
I'd rather take a smaller share now than keep losing to inflation!
Inflation is really hurting you now. I'll take the lion's share!
